forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain this morning, with showers continuing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. ESE winds shifting to N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 51F. ESE winds shifting to N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 16C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with a steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early. Mostly sunny along with windy conditions during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early. Mostly sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
